about.title: About the project
paragraphs: MálagaPets was born as a personal project that combines my passion for web development with my love for pets. Using open data from Málaga City Council about dog parks and veterinary information provided by the Official College of Veterinarians of Málaga, I have created a modern platform that makes it easy to find both safe dog spaces and trusted veterinary services in our city, offering a comprehensive tool for caring for our pets.

My goal is for MálagaPets to continue growing with new sections covering different aspects of life with pets: from association services, grooming, specialized stores, to pet-friendly events and educational resources on animal care. Each new feature will be developed with the same attention to detail and using official sources.

Beyond technology, I firmly believe that caring for our pets is a unique opportunity to connect with our community, meet neighbors and strengthen the bonds that make Málaga a more welcoming place for everyone, including our beloved pets.
about.sign: Thank you for your interest in learning more about this project.

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.description: Welcome to MálagaPets. By accessing and using this website, you agree to comply with these terms and conditions of use. If you do not agree with any of these terms, please do not use this site.

usage.title: 2. Use of the Site
usage.intro: This website is a personal informative project about pet resources in Málaga. You can:

allowed.read: Read and consult all published content
allowed.share: Share links to our articles on social media
allowed.contact: Contact us through the available form

notAllowed.title: Not allowed
notAllowed.copy: Copy, reproduce or redistribute content without express authorization
notAllowed.commercial: Use content for commercial purposes without permission
notAllowed.harm: Attempt to damage, hack or compromise site security

intellectual.title: 3. Intellectual Property
intellectual.description: All content on this website (texts, images, design, code, logos) is protected by copyright and belongs to MálagaPets or its respective owners.
intellectual.permission: If you wish to use any content, please contact us to request permission.

thirdParty.title: 4. Third-Party Content
thirdParty.images: Images from licensed photo banks (Unsplash, Pexels, etc.)
thirdParty.embeds: Embedded content from services like Google Maps, YouTube, etc.
thirdParty.openData: Open data from Málaga City Council and the Official College of Veterinarians of Málaga

externalLinks.title: 5. External Links
externalLinks.description: This site may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the content, privacy policies or practices of these external sites. We recommend reading their terms before interacting with them.

disclaimer.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
disclaimer.intro: The content on this site is provided "as is" for informational purposes. We do not guarantee:
disclaimer.accuracy: The accuracy, completeness or timeliness of information
disclaimer.errors: The absence of errors or viruses
disclaimer.damages: We are not responsible for damages arising from the use of this site
disclaimer.noteText: Information about dog parks, veterinary centers and pet services may change. Always verify with official sources before traveling.

modifications.title: 7. Modifications
modifications.description: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon publication on this page. We recommend reviewing this page periodically.

contact.title: 8. Contact
contact.description: If you have questions about these terms, you can contact us through the contact form available on the website.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By using this website, you confirm that you have read, understood and accepted these Terms and Conditions of Use.
